titleStmt.title: A general epistle to the dispersed and persecuted flock of Christ Jesus in the dominion of England and all parts and regions where this shall come who have believed in Christ the Light of the World and now suffers for his names sake / [by] F.H.
titleStmt.author: Howgill, Francis, 1618-1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
